CREATE TABLE Customers (
 customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 name VARCHAR(50),
 age INT,
 gender VARCHAR(10),
 location VARCHAR(100)
);


CREATE TABLE Segmentation (
 segmentation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 customer_id INT,
 demographics VARCHAR(100),
 behavior VARCHAR(100),
 preferences VARCHAR(100),
 CONSTRAINT fk_customer_id FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES Customers(customer_id)
);

### STATEMENT

INSERT INTO Customers (customer_id, name, age, gender, location) VALUES (1, 'Alice', 25, 'Female', 'New York') ON CONFLICT (customer_id) DO UPDATE SET name = 'Alice', age = 25, gender = 'Female', location = 'New York';

);
